desc: Buy kombucha online and have it delivered to your door. Kombucha is sparkling fermented tea. Our award-winning kombucha tea is vegan, gluten free, and full of healthy organic acids. Only the finest, ethical teas. Made in Scotland, Left Field Kombucha is a handcrafted drink. Scotland's 1st kombucha tea company.

layout.text: FOUR BIG TEAS. FOUR BIG FLAVOURS.
